Space

The base class for spaces.

Summary
SpaceThe base class for spaces.
Functions
getNameReturns the name of the shift.
allocateNewShiftUsed when it necessary to kick off shift allocation from with in a Space and not from the ShiftMenu.
editShiftTell the shift to go into edit mode.
setValueSet a value with GM_setValue
getValueRetrieve a value with GM_setValue
orderFrontMove a shift back in the display order.
orderBackMove a shift front in the display order.
regionIsObscuredChecks to see if any of the visible shifts are obscuring the region.
setCurrentShiftSet the current shift.
getCurrentShiftSet the current shift.

Functions

getName

getName : function()

Returns the name of the shift.

allocateNewShift

allocateNewShift: function()

Used when it necessary to kick off shift allocation from with in a Space and not from the ShiftMenu.  ImageSwap uses this.

editShift

editShift : function(shiftId)

Tell the shift to go into edit mode.

setValue

setValue : function(key,
value)

Set a value with GM_setValue

Parameters

keythe key of the value to set.
valuethe value itself.

getValue

getValue : function(key,
defaultValue)

Retrieve a value with GM_setValue

Parameters

keythe key of the value to retrieve.
defaultValuereturned if the key hasn’t been set before.

orderFront

orderFront : function(shiftId,
layer)

Move a shift back in the display order.  This is generally called by ShiftSpace.  + Parameters: shiftId - the id of the Shift.

orderBack

orderBack : function(shiftId,
layer)

Move a shift front in the display order.

Parameters

shiftIdthe id of the Shift.

regionIsObscured

regionIsObscured : function(region)

Checks to see if any of the visible shifts are obscuring the region.

setCurrentShift

setCurrentShift : function(newShift)

Set the current shift.

getCurrentShift

getCurrentShift : function()

Set the current shift.
